name: low-kick
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120. Target’s weight | Power --------------- | ----: Up to 10kg | 20 Up to 25kg | 40 Up to 50kg | 60 Up to 100kg | 80 Up to 200kg | 100 Above 200kg | 120
short_effect: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.

flavor_text.sword-shield: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.
